transcripts.text: Hey guys, my name is Amy.  My name is Marlon.

And we're tour guides here at Liberty University, and we're going to tell you a little bit about our East Campus dorms.  These style of dorms are apartment style, so there's seven total people in each suite.  Rooms A and C have two people to a room, while room B has three people.  Each room comes complete with a full bathroom, your own beds, desks, and chairs, and your own walk-in closet.

Now with East Campus being your apartment style of living here on campus, you have your living room space with provided furniture as well as your own thermostat where you're able to control the temperature of the suite.  Along with that, you have your kitchen space where you have several different appliances such as your refrigerator, your stove and oven, as well as a dishwasher.  But the main thing we want to emphasize here on East Campus is that you have your own washer and dryer where you can wash your clothes however frequent or however many times.
As you can see, East Campus is the perfect place to live if you want that more apartment, adult style feel, but you still get to live on campus all at the same time.  We hope to see you guys soon.
